{{cpp/experimental/title|swap&lt;small&gt;(std::experimental::propagate_const)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2/propagate_const/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=libfund_ts_2|
template&lt; class T &gt;
constexpr void swap( std::experimental::propagate_const&lt;T&gt;&amp; lhs,
                     std::experimental::propagate_const&lt;T&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept(/* see below */);
}}

Specializes the {{lc|swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::experimental::propagate_const}}. Swaps the pointers of {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}}. Equivalent to {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

{{rrev|since=libfund_ts_3|
{{cpp/enable_if|{{c|std::is_swappable_v&lt;T&gt;}} is {{c|true}}}}.
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{tt|propagate_const}}s whose contents to swap}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
(none)

===Exceptions===
{{noexcept|noexcept(lhs.swap(rhs))}}

===Complexity===
Constant.
